duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute, communicate, and innovate Kelly Education Sourcing to meet the pool size needed for successful fulfillment of job requests.
Strategize and implement recruiting plans utilizing the best methods and resources in the respective communities.
Act as the face of Kelly Education, attracting talent and ensuring weekly/monthly activity benchmarks are met.
Coordinate with school districts to monitor applicant flow and meet recruitment needs.
Go into the Jefferson City, MO location twice a week and reside within the surrounding area.

education_certification.credential: 1-2 years of Recruiting, Staffing, or Customer Service experience with a track record of success in Job Board and Recruiting Strategies.
